pages.title: Infernal Infusion
pages.description: The Infernal Infusion gives creatures the power of $(item)The Nether$(). The abilities available through the Infusion are utilized with various controls using a $(l:artifacts/tools/witches_hand)Witches Hand$(/l)

pages.title: Creature Enthrall
pages.description: Sneak+punch a creature to enthrall it.

pages.title: Creature Sacrifice
pages.description: Sneak+punch an enthralled creature to sacrifice it, and gain its powers.

pages.title: Infernal Command
pages.description: Punch a creature to make enthralled creatures attack it.

pages.title: Infernal Command
pages.description: Sneak-use on the ground to make all weak nearby creatures move to that location, if possible.

pages.title: Steal Powers
pages.description: Use to activate the power from the last sacrificed creature. The creature might give an active and a passive ability.$(p)$(9)$(bold)$(item)Zombie$()$(br)$(2)[Active] $()$(item)Strength II$() and $(item)Resistance II$() for 30 seconds$(br)$(2)[Passive] $()None$(p)$(9)$(bold)$(item)Enderman$()$(br)$(2)[Active] $()Teleport to targeted location$(br)$(2)[Passive] $()None
